[p] pause -- [arrows] to move

backstory.

I spent hours playing snake on my first mobile phone - maybe because it was my first mobile phone or possibly because of how simple the game was. Regardless, I wanted to create a version of the snake game that I loved playing.

tech.

The first iteration of snakia. used the html5 canvas api, javascript and jquery.

The current itteration was re-written using Javascript, React, babel, and Redux - complied with Webpack and Yarn package manager. As a result, the framerate increased by 4%, which is a positive for a game this simple, and the size of the assets reduced by 73% - the entire bundle is only 188kb.

additional projects.
